name: css-filter-bright
description: Css module of single purpose classes for filter bright

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-filter-bright.css > css/css-filter-bright.css && tachyons src/css-filter-bright.css --minify > css/css-filter-bright.min.css && tachyons src/css-filter-bright.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
